questions.quote: Right after we get off the phone, then you go and tell her that?! Well, of course she knows it was me who complained! Now I'm responsible for this woman's quitting. Oh, this is unbelievable!
So you're denying him the scholarship just because he wants to be a city planner?
I'd like to have a kid. Of course, you have to have a date first... Remember my friend, Adam, from Detroit?
You put a label on something, then ten minutes later it would peel right off.  It was the worst gift I ever got.
Oh, it be so. I'm out there, Jerry, an' I'm lllovin' every minute of it!!!
I can't call her now. It's too soon. I'm planning a Wednesday call.
Well, I think you're wrong about that.  [Elaine walks past the window again, glancing in] And ah now if you'll excuse me, I'd really like to get started, please.
Hey Bania, the dinners off. The ticket's no good. The numbers are all smudged out.
The broken window, Klompus never fixed it. They just walked right in.
Fine, okay. It's just, I've never seen a beautiful lady reading 'the Guide' so far away from a TV. You must really like television.
